title: Exploring Artificial Intelligence Adoption in Public Organizations: A Comparative Case Study
research_description: This study investigates the factors influencing AI adoption in public organizations. It compares eight Swiss public organizations across different levels of government. The research identifies how technological, organizational, and environmental factors impact AI adoption, using qualitative methods including semi-structured interviews and document analysis.
research_results: The findings highlight that technological factors such as relative advantage and compatibility play a crucial role in AI adoption, particularly in organizations with advanced AI projects. Organizational factors like top management support and change management are key across different stages of adoption.
future_research: Future research could explore AI adoption in public organizations in other countries and compare sector-specific challenges in public services.
